scripts.clean: rimraf resources/web/pipeline/gen && rimraf resources/views/gen && rimraf resources/views/*.* && rimraf resources/web/gen
scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config node_modules/@labkey/build/webpack/dev.config.js --color
scripts.build-prod: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production PROD_SOURCE_MAP=source-map webpack --config node_modules/@labkey/build/webpack/prod.config.js --color --progress --profile
